version_description:
Hello there, dear customer! In this update, we have fixed a few minor bugs and updated our rules.

As usual, this version contains an updated blocker list with fixes and improvements for issues on some websites you've reported. Make sure to manually launch the app after updating to the latest version to have new rules applied in Safari.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime on Twitter at @1BlockerApp.

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

Hello there, dear customer! In this update, we have fixed a few minor bugs and updated our rules.

As usual, this version contains an updated blocker list with fixes and improvements for issues on some websites you've reported. Make sure to manually launch the app after updating to the latest version to have new rules applied in Safari.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime on Twitter at @1BlockerApp.

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

Hello there, dear customer! In this update, we have fixed a few minor bugs and updated our rules.

As usual, this version contains an updated blocker list with fixes and improvements for issues on some websites you've reported. Make sure to manually launch the app after updating to the latest version to have new rules applied in Safari.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime on Twitter at @1BlockerApp.

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

Even when we’re quiet there are many things moving and changing. Thank you for being so patient.

This update adds partial whitelist — a feature many of you waited for a long time. It allows you to configure each blocking category for a specific site and do things like unblock comments and ads for a site, but leave trackers and other content blocked. This feature was asked by many advanced users and it adds further flexibility to the app.

Speaking of whitelist, it is much faster now to add a site to the list (up to 25% faster in some cases).

Of course, we also updated our ruleset and fixed a ton of sites. Thanks for all the reports you sent us!

Last but not least, this update contains many tweaks that make the experience so much better.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime on Twitter at @1BlockerApp.

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

1Blocker version 3.1 brings various small improvements, adds Click Mode to the Visual Editor, and includes an updated set of rules.

When you use our Visual Editor to hide a webpage element in Safari, you can now temporarily disable selection by activating Click Mode, which lets you perform click actions. For example, you can activate Click Mode to log in to your account, navigate to a different page or open a menu before selecting elements to hide.

In the next updates, we will focus on interface performance improvements. I thank you for being patient.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime at @1BlockerApp on Twitter or via email. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release!

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

Hi! 1Blocker 3.0 is a major update that brings many new features:

• Frequent rule updates via the cloud
• Advanced customization
• Basic features are available for free

This version 3.0.1 fixes minor bugs.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime at @1BlockerApp on Twitter or via email. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release!

If you enjoy using 1Blocker, please leave a nice review here on the App Store. We read everything and it means a world to us. Thank you!

Hi! 1Blocker 3.0 is a major update that brings many new features:

• Frequent rule updates via the cloud
• Advanced customization
• Basic features are available for free

This version 3.0.3 contains an updated rule set. It also fixes a couple of minor bugs.

Previous version 3.0.2 fixed a bug that caused issues with upgrading from the legacy version.

If something’s not working right, you have an idea you’d like to share, or you just want to say hello, contact us anytime at @1BlockerApp on Twitter or via email. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release!

1Blocker has been fully localized into German now! We’re so excited to share this update with our users who speak Deutsch. We hope you’ll like this update we made for you. If there’s a way to improve the translation, please let us know by reaching out via support@1blocker.com or by visiting our Translator Center at translate.1blocker.com.

Of course, we’ve also updated our built-in rules. So even if you use the free version, you get all the latest filters as of February 17th.

Please send us your questions and feedback at support@1blocker.com or @1BlockerApp on Twitter. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release. We’ll also help you if there’s an issue with the app on your device — don’t worry, we are here for you.

If you’re generous with your time and want to support us, feel free to leave a nice review here on the App Store. We’ll also appreciate it if you recommend 1Blocker to someone. As an indie developer, it means a world to us. Thank you!

We are constantly improving 1Blocker and listening to your feedback. This release contains two major updates for you.

1. We translated the app into three more languages. 1Blocker now fully supports Spanish, French, and Italian. Let us know if you like it!

2. We expanded our Regional section of built-in rules with new country-specific additions for improved Spanish, Italian, French, Japanese, and Dutch ad blocking.

If the translation can be improved in any way, please let us know by reaching out to support@1blocker.com or by visiting our Translator Center at translate.1blocker.com.

We have some exciting new things just a little farther down the road, so stay tuned. Follow us @1BlockerApp on Twitter.

Please send us your questions and feedback at support@1blocker.com or @1BlockerApp on Twitter. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release. We’ll also help you if there’s an issue with the app on your device.

If you’re feeling generous with your time, you can support us by leaving a nice review in the App Store. We’d also appreciate it if you recommend 1Blocker to someone. As an indie developer, it means the world to us. Thank you!

1Blocker 3.5 focuses on accessibility, new regional filters, and interface tweaks:

• Improved support for accessibility features (VoiceOver) that let you experience everything 1Blocker has to offer.
• Added new regional filters for better Chinese and Polish ad blocking.
• Fixed minor interface bugs.

We fixed a crash that sometimes happened when you changed your blocking settings on another device.

If you have enabled Reduce Motion in your device's settings, you won't see the confetti animation during first-time onboarding and subscribing to premium.

We improved the readability of our error codes. It makes debugging easier now when something goes wrong.

We also updated our built-in filters with the latest fixes for sites.

Please send us your questions and feedback at support@1blocker.com or @1BlockerApp on Twitter. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release. We'll also help you if there's an issue with the app on your device.
